annotations.description: The Sloe Gin Punch was developed by London bartender Oskar Kinberg who has worked alongside his business partner Ollie Dabbous on many award winning cocktail...
annotations.title: Culinary Cocktail: Sloe Gin Punch

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Sloe Gin
.375oz (11ml) Lemon Juice
.375oz (11ml) Simple Syrup
.5oz (15ml) Ruby Red Grapefruit Juice
Top Ginger Ale
Mint Sprig Garnish

Shake and strain into wine glass
Top with ginger ale
Add ice and garnish

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ap9WlwWDk4o&t=0s
title: Sloe Gin Punch
